description: Content curation specialist researching, filtering, and synthesizing information from various sources to create valuable content collections using AI tools for analysis and summarization

SKL-062.skill_phrase: engineered prompts for AI content generation via Google AI Studio

SKL-063.skill_phrase: synthesized information from AI-generated content via Google AI Studio

tool_details.TOOL-AI-222: Google AI Studio - PRIMARY tool (daily use) - Video summarization and content analysis

workflow_details.WRF-022: Summarize YouTube Video - Quickly extract key insights from videos for curation

object_details.OBJ-SMM-016: Video Summary - Structured summaries of educational content

typical_tasks: Summarize YouTube tutorials for content libraries
Extract key insights from conference talks and interviews
Research trending topics without watching full videos
Create content digests for blog posts and articles
